channel.title: Player-Characters on Moonfall Sessions
channel.description: Recent content in Player-Characters on Moonfall Sessions

item.title: Lieutenant Jasper Gaines
item.description: Former Eldoran soldier turned deserter who chose loyalty to friends over empire

item.title: [Helisanna](/player-characters/Helisanna) Doomfall
item.description: Human bard/warlock and metal music frontwoman with supernatural influence over her audience

item.title: [Red](/player-characters/Red) (Thurnok Skyhammer)
item.description: Goliath cleric and lost prince who made the ultimate sacrifice to save his people

item.title: [Silas](/player-characters/Silas) Fairbanks
item.description: Scheming halfling rogue with psychic abilities and a dangerous criminal past

item.title: Elspeth Cooper
item.description: Dwarf Artificer and former professional racer seeking justice for her disqualification

item.title: Felonias Bru
item.description: Chaotic goblin artificer with a love of explosives, fire, and mysterious beverages

item.title: Retired Detective Olivia Cooper
item.description: Elderly dwarf paladin and former police detective with unmatched investigative skills
